name: Chute
long_description:
hute powers enterprise UGC for brands, agencies and publishers â€“ from discovering consumer photos and videos, both with visual and text search, to the ideation, production, and amplification of compelling visual material.

Chute works with some of the worldâ€™s biggest brands and publishers including Benefit Cosmetics, NBCUniversal, adidas, Brown-Forman, CondÃ© Nast, NBA, United Nations, New York Times, and Ford. For more information, visit www.getchute.com.

You can reach us anytime at hello@getchute.com. We look forward to hearing from you!

name: Reddit
long_description:
Founded by Steve Huffman and Alexis Ohanian in 2005, Reddit is an online community where users submit, vote, and comment on content, news, and discussions. Nicknamed "the front page of the internet,"â€‹ Reddit is one of the top ten sites in the United States (source: Alexa), with hundreds of millions of users each month on desktop, mobile web, and our official Android/iOS apps. 

Interested in joining our growing team? Check out about.reddit.com/careers
one_liner: The frontpage of the internet.

name: Twitch
long_description: Twitch is the worldâ€™s leading video platform and community for gamers. More than 100 million gamers gather every month to broadcast, watch and chat about gaming. Twitchâ€™s video platform is the backbone of live and on-demand distribution for leading video game broadcasters including casual gamers, pro players, tournaments, leagues, developers and gaming media organizations. Twitch is leading a revolution in the gaming community, working to create a participatory experience that transcends gameplay. Learn more at http://twitch.tv.
one_liner: A global community creating the future of live entertainment.

name: 9gag
long_description:
9GAG  is the global cross-platform entertainment media network. It is a place for fun, conversation, and engagement. Founded in 2008, 9GAGâ€™s mission is to make the world happier. 

9GAG has a total of 150 million global audience with 39 million followers on Facebook, 44 million on Instagram and 15 million on Twitter. Being #1 ranked global social media platform in entertainment & gaming, #1 ranked US's cross-platform video creators, we distribute 2.2 billion social video views on a monthly basis (source: tubular labs). 9GAG.com is #6 most followed  brand on Instagram and is a top 200 website globally.

9GAG is backed by: Freestyle Capital, True Ventures, First Round Capital, Greycroft Partners, 500 Startups, Y Combinator and a group of great angel investors in the United States. eg Anthony Soohoo, Benjamin Ling, BoxGroup, Gary Vaynerchuk, James Hong, Kevin Rose, Karl Jacob, Lowercase Capital, Maneesh Arora, Naval Ravikant, Othman Laraki, Philip Kaplan, Rich Chen, Rich Lefurgy, Scott and Cyan Banister, Tim Ferriss.
one_liner: Make the world happier.

name: BeatDeck
long_description: Beatdeck is a big data music analytics platform. It is used to evaluate artist's KPM, analyze social signals, and provide a clean extensive dashboard into the music industry. Beatdeck was founded in January 2013 at Y Combinator in Mountain View, CA by Josh Mangel and Avi Zolty.
one_liner:
Music, Metrics... Meritocracy. 
(Upload Music, Connect your Socialâ€¦

name: Naytev
long_description:
Y-Combinator (S14)

A/B test your videos, articles, and images on Facebook, and automatically publish the best version everywhere. Get started at www.naytev.com.

Testing is every top social team's secret weapon.
It's no secret that standing out in the News Feed has become more difficult. That's why elite content teams test how the content they post to Facebook will appear.

We help the top brands and publishers in the world stand out in the noise and reach larger audiences. With Naytev's cutting-edge techniques, you can run expert-level tests in a matter of minutes.

Already an expert? We can help you scale your test volume and improve the quality of your tests.
one_liner: Naytev automates paid and organic social media management in one place

name: Makrwatch
long_description:
Makrwatch helps D2C companies scale user acquisition with YouTube creators. Our clients see us as an alternative growth channel to Google/Facebook, by reaching their audience at a more efficient cost per acquisition and obtaining high quality customers that are more engaged. 

Makrwatch has been growing 100%+ year over year, currently processes 2M-5M in billings and helps creators in over 60+ countries. We are reaching 20 team members in 6+ countries, have been fully remote for the past years and aim to reach 20M in billings with 10,000 sponsored videos within the next 18 months.
one_liner: Scale new user acquisition with YouTube Creators

name: Wakie
long_description: Users perform millions of calls and send hundreds of millions of messages every month. The topics vary from language practicing to mental issues to personal life conversations.
one_liner: A social app for phone calls. Express yourself and make real friends.

name: Streamup
long_description: Streamup is a fun way to live stream music videos. Join our community to watch exciting shows and chat with the musicians you love!
one_liner: Streamup is a live streaming community for music. We make it fun andâ€¦

name: Coub
long_description: Coub is a short looped video service. They are easy to create online and can be featured with soundtrack. The resulting videos are highly viral, thats why Coub is a fast growing. It has already more than 51M unique visitors per month.
one_liner: Coub is YouTube for video loops. You can take any video from YouTube,â€¦

name: Jumpcut
long_description: We help aspiring creators go viral and monetize their content.
one_liner: Helping creators go viral and build businesses.

name: Breaker
long_description:
Breaker is a podcast listening and discovery application.

Most podcasts are free, but serious publishers are spending big budgets to make high quality audio content like Serial, which hit 100 million downloads and made podcasts mainstream. 67 million Americans are already listening to podcasts a month. Breaker wants to sign exclusive deals to distribute the best premium podcasts and charge users $6 per month. First, its goal is to build a huge listener audience by making the best podcast consumption app. It launched today, and will offer podcasters ways to connect and get feedback from their community, and analytics about what content performs best. It has a stunning 67% retention rate after a month for beta users. If it can convince people to pay for whatâ€™s often free, it could become the preferred place for podcasters to talk.
one_liner: A podcast company.

name: Covetly
long_description: Covetly is a platform for collectors and hobbyists. Tons of rare, unique, and bizarre items await. Browse, trade, and buy or sell. What do you covet?
one_liner: #1 Collectibles Marketplace: Authentic Vinyl Toys, Comics, Funko Pop

name: Wildfire
long_description: We started Wildfire during our senior year at UC Berkeley as a safety alert app for colleges. Wildfire quickly grew beyond a campus safety tool to a social news app, which empowered people to spread the word quickly to their community when something significant happened nearby. Over six years, we've sent 65 million alerts to nearly 1 million users.
one_liner: Social news app

name: Storyboard
long_description:
Introducing Storyboard, the leading platform designed to connect the world's top brands, innovative creative agencies, and dynamic influencers with their communities on Instagram and Snapchat.

Our mission is to simplify and enhance your online presence on Instagram and Snapchat, offering a comprehensive suite of powerful and intuitive features:

1. Seamless Automation: Storyboard enables smooth, automatic sharing of your stories between Instagram and Snapchat. No more manual cross-platform management, saving you time while maintaining content consistency.

2. Advanced Performance Tracking: Measure the impact of your efforts with our advanced performance analytics toolkit. Gain in-depth insights into engagement, reach, and other essential metrics, empowering you to adjust your strategy in real time for optimal results.

3. Strategic Planning: Anticipate your campaigns by scheduling your stories and posts in advance. Our user-friendly interface lets you create a consistent editorial calendar, ensuring your content reaches your audience at the right times.

Discover how Storyboard can transform your presence on Instagram and Snapchat. Join visionary brands already placing their trust in Storyboard to optimize their social media presence. Whether you're a large corporation or an independent creative, our scalable platform will continue to deliver exciting new features to propel your online impact.
one_liner: Social media management tool for Instagram and Snapchat

name: Lokal
one_liner: Local news, information and classifieds for India's small town users

name: Trendpop
long_description:
Trendpop is the leading analytics and insights platform for short-form video marketing. Weâ€™re on a mission to help anyone go viral on social video platforms. Weâ€™re a deeply technical team that has taken a data-first approach to this problem: our core engine has collected over a billion social video posts that are analyzed with state-of-the-art algorithms to understand the recommendation algorithms that power virality. 

Trendpop was co-founded by Yoav Zimmerman (CEO) and Jonathan (Yoni) Ben-tzur (CTO) in August 2020, raising money from YCombinator (W21) to build Trendpop and growing to profitability in 12 short months. In January 2022, Trendpop was acquired by Collab, a veteran company in the digital creator space and an official TikTok creative and marketing partner. Today, Trendpop powers the TikTok marketing programs of top major record labels in North America and is quickly expanding to new markets in the film, television, beauty, and DTC eCommerce industry. Trendpop is currently used by leading marketing and A&R professionals in the music industry (both indie and major) to help their artists go viral on TikTok and hundreds of brands and creators who consistently win on social video.
one_liner: Discover trends as they happen

name: Rethoric
long_description:
Rethoric is a plug-and-play content team specialized in helping founders publish high-quality content consistently and grow on LinkedIn to get 1M+ monthly impressions.

Most founders know the value of building an audience on LinkedIn, but the process demands consistency, time, creativity, writing skills, and energyâ€”things founders often lack.

Our clients only need to attend a monthly content interview session, and we do the rest.
one_liner: LinkedIn content & strategy for founders to get 1M monthly impressions

name: Friz
long_description: Brainstorm, create, publish and manage content and advertisements on social media using 1 tool.
one_liner: AI Social Media Manager

name: Eggnog
long_description:
Eggnog is the Youtube for AI-generated content. The initial product is the only AI video platform on the market that generates consistent characters. The vision is to have the largest library of remixable characters and sets for users to collaboratively build and watch AI-generated content. Eggnog launched a week ago, and videos made on the platform are getting 100k views on Twitter.

Team: Sam (BS, Applied Math from Harvard) was a data scientist at Facebook and Quora working on newsfeed and creator monetization. Jitesh (BS, MEng from MIT CS) was a consultant at McKinsey and PM at Flexport.
one_liner: Youtube for AI-generated content

name: Soundry AI
long_description: We have built a universal text-to-sound AI generator for musicians and sound designers. Music producers build songs with samples that they've hand crafted with our AI, and sound designers can incorporate generated sound effects into film, TV, and video games. With personalized generations and training data hand-picked by your favorite artists, Soundry AI is your new best friend in the music creation process.
one_liner: Professional Quality AI Music Creation

name: HeartByte
long_description: Storio is a content platform where creators can create original fiction or derivative works based on other fictional worlds. Creators write fictions 10 times faster on Storio. It's a place for community to fully indulge in the fictional world that they wish they were in.
one_liner: GenAI Interactive story. Creator write fictions 10x faster.

name: Remade
long_description:
Remade is building an AI-native canvas for creative workflows. 
Try it now at: app.remade.ai
one_liner: AI-native canvas for creative workflows.

name: Argil
one_liner: The video generation engine for the creator economy

name: Typa
long_description:
We help businesses capture what resonates, make it repeatable, and turn attention into lasting momentum. With Typa, you can build a scalable inbound growth engine with content that compounds.

We make this possible through three pillars:

1. A tone of voice that always sounds like you. Typa learns your style, cadence, and perspective so every piece of content reflects your authentic voice.

2. A knowledge base that updates in real time. Your digital clone continuously absorbs everything you say and create, ensuring your content always reflects your latest thinking.

3. A personal ghostwriter thatâ€™s always just a call away. Puff is your 24/7 AI ghostwriter and strategist, available via phone or WhatsApp whenever you want to brainstorm, plan, or execute.

Currently supported channels: X, LinkedIn, Bluesky, and blog/newsletters.
one_liner: The content engine that wins attention and drives growth.

name: Darkgrade
long_description: We're building a protocol for large language models to directly interface with image sensors.
one_liner: Let your camera understand the world

name: Charm
long_description: Charm makes sending money as easy as sending email. Most people juggle multiple payment apps and scattered balances. Charm lets you pay anyone â€” no matter what app they use â€” and earns you 5% interest on your balance, automatically.
one_liner: Charm is the universal payments app â€” send money to anyone.

name: neoncoral

name: Digipals
long_description:
Social networks are dead. Social media became more media than social. My friends aren't on social media anymore - it's one third ads, one third content from strangers, and one third AI slop. Our social lives are fragmented across dozens of different apps - iMessage, WhatsApp, Find My, Partiful, and Venmo. 

Digipals is the first AI-native social operating system that improves our relationships with friends. We built ambient AI agents that use social context from our location, calendar, and photos to take action and write code in our group chats. We are the last social platform anyone will ever need.

Launch Video
https://youtu.be/KW2tjLl6sxM
one_liner: The future of Social in the age of AI

name: Bluma
long_description:
Bluma is the first AI short form content engine.

In a post-AI world, attention is the most valuable commodity. Social media is only growing faster and faster, and we're still early.

We automate your entire consumer marketing strategy with content templates, generating on brand videos on autopilot.

Everything that a growth team would plan, script, produce, and edit, Bluma automates end-to-end and at scale. We can make entire UGC videos from a reference at 10x the scale and 1/10th of the cost. We remove the operations of hiring, managing, creatives and spend with AI.
one_liner: The new media distribution company

name: Shofo
long_description: Shofo builds large-scale social media training datasets by collecting, labeling, and enriching public content for pre-training and fine-tuning AI models. Our indexes continuously collect and update every post across hard to access social media platforms. Companies use Shofo to avoid building their own data collection and processing systems and spending months turning unstructured social content into model-ready data. We started with TikTok and are expanding across every major social platform.
one_liner: Scraping hard to access social media posts to curate training datasets
